actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM ke_hoach_bao_cao khbc 
            WHERE khbc.ke_hoach_id = kh.id
        ) THEN 'Đã hoàn thành'
        ELSE 'Chưa hoàn thành'
    END AS x,
    COUNT(*) AS y
FROM ke_hoach kh
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM ke_hoach_bao_cao khbc 
            WHERE khbc.ke_hoach_id = kh.id
        ) THEN 'Đã hoàn thành'
        ELSE 'Chưa hoàn thành'
    END;
